name: ssini
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpbi(wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, cin(c1, c2))
-| wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2))
-| wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, cin(c1, c2))
-| wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2))
-| wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2))
-| wss(c0, c1)
-| wss(c0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, cin(c1, c2))
-| wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
-| wss(c0, c1)
-| wss(c0, c2)

body.origin: |- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, cin(c1, c2))
-| wss(c0, c1)
-| wss(c0, c2)

comment: An inference showing that a subclass of two classes is a subclass of their intersection. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2003.)
